title: looking for another font?
content:
As always, I appreciate any and all help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821145620im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/grand%20opera_6036.jpg)

 [‹ Font ID : help!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821145620/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44886 "Go to previous forum topic") [Can any please let me know what font these are and where I might find them? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821145620/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44871 "Go to next forum topic")
author: stealyourboognish

comments.content:
Hard to tell with the roughness, but it looks like Friz Quadrata.

- Lex
